doc.after: The University of Pittsburgh commonly referred to as Pitt is an urban state related research university located in the Oakland neighborhood of Pittsburgh Pennsylvania with four regional campuses throughout Western Pennsylvania Founded in 1787 Pitt is one of the oldest continuously chartered institutions of higher education in the United States
